name: Amanda Kearns
text: This was my first time at this restaurant and im thrilled. Its rare to impossible to find food that all of my family members like and in this case we all loved our food. Staff was friendly and fast. Inside was very clean. You have gained lifetime customers.  Thank you so much!

name: Aubree Temple
text: The food is not bad at all but when ordering my pizza, I ordered a two topping, which I chose pepperoni and mushroom for. When the worker cooking the pizzas pulled my pizza out, I had noticed it looked a little plain. I was watching the ‚Ä¶More

name: Benjamin Moe
text: It's a Subway/Qdoba style ordering system and the pizzas come out pretty fast.  I love that they have a gluten free option so my wife and kids can eat here as well. My pizza was pretty good and their price is competitive.

name: Carol Korson
text: Jack, Christian and Austin were very courteous, fun and made my friend and I a great pizza!  We definitely will be back!  Thank you guys you did a great job!!

name: Christopher Wilburn
text: My first time here.  It was so good! Normally,  I have to share a pizza with the kids and wife.  Usually its pretty plain jane. I got to build my own pizza and load it up with all sorts of delicious goodies.  Blaze was a delicious escape from the normal.

name: Debra Gommesen
text:
Gluten free crust, fresh made.
Vegan cheese-no extra charge.
All veggies, meats, cheeses, sauces included in basic price!
The BEST GF PIZZA I've ever eaten.

name: Caitlin Ketelsen
text: Blaze pizza is always so fresh and delicious! Jay is such a great employee! He makes my pizza almost every time I am in. He is so kind and patient when making my pizza. He also always has great suggestions for additional toppings or food. He is always smiling and seems happy to be there at work. I appreciate Jay's work very much!

name: Dave Marshall
text: The staff was very upbeat, attentive, and professional. The person who helped me, Brice, will go far with his positive attitude.

name: Jeffrie Tripp
text: Good pizza. Can not spell. Fire'd is not a word. Should be Fired' for emphasis.

name: Joe Ryan
text: Always a great pizza. Their carryout experience is top notch.  Order online or with the app and its ready for pickup or curbside when you want it ready.

name: Howard Larsen
text: Jay is the best pizza maker on the planet.  He made the best meat lover's pizza I have ever tasted.   He took his time to get the toppings evenly spread and didn't skimp on anything.  He cooked it slow and evenly so it came out perfect.  Service is fast and friendly.  Can't wait to go back there.

name: Andy Castle

text: Amazing job Blaze pizza! Clean, friendly,  helpful. Special shout-out to Unique,  Austen, Dustin, Jay, and Jack for this wonderful experience.

name: Grace Scott
text: Five stars for our buddy Jay. He makes the best pizzas for my husband and I. He takes consideration with each pizza he makes, which makes us want to come back. Love the vegan cheese too!

name: Gina Gepford
text: I love there pizza and how you choose your own toppings

text: Omg!! BLAZE PIZZA IS AMAZING!!! Great pizza, great employees, and it is fast!!! Probably my favorite pizza!

Really, really fresh ingredients. Anything on a 6 slice pizza for $8 or a half pizza combo for the same price. Delicious pizza without the over stuffed bloat feeling!
